text_paragraphs: Information Note on the Court’s case-law 16
The case concerns the length of civil proceedings brought against the applicants in August 1994. The proceedings ended in October 1997 and therefore lasted 15 years, one month and eight days.
Article 41: The Court awarded each of the two applicants 30,000 francs (FRF) in respect of non-pecuniary damage. It also made an award in respect of costs.

This summary by the Registry does not bind the Court.
